verses.verse: And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H5414>cried;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron:<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3863>Would<s%> God that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%> or <S%H3863>would<s%> God we had <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness!<s%>

And <S%H4100>why<s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> us to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> that our <S%H802>wives<s%> and our <S%H2945>children<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey?<s%> were it not <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> Let us <S%H5414>make<s%> a <S%H7218>captain,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> which were of them that <S%H8446>searched<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> their <S%H899>clothes:<s%>

And they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>company<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H5674>passed<s%> through to <S%H8446>search<s%> it, is an <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in us, then he will <S%H935>bring<s%> us <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> it us; a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H389>Only<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> not you against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> you the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> for they are <S%H3899>bread<s%> for us: their <S%H6738>defense<s%> is <S%H5493>departed<s%> from them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with us: <S%H3372>fear<s%> them not.

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones.<s%> And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5006>provoke<s%> me? and <S%H5704>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> they <S%H539>believe<s%> me, for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them?

I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> them with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and <S%H3423>disinherit<s%> them, and will <S%H6213>make<s%> of you a <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than they.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Then the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, (for you <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> in your <S%H3581>might<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> them;)

And they will <S%H559>tell<s%> it to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> for they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that you <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5869>face<s%> to <S%H5869>face,<s%> and that your <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, and that you <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, by <S%H3119>day<s%> time in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Now if you shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> all <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> then the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of you will <S%H559>speak,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1115>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them, therefore he has <S%H7819>slain<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, let the <S%H3581>power<s%> of my <S%H136>LORD<s%> be <S%H1431>great,<s%> according as you have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H750>long-suffering,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and by <S%H3808>no<s%> means <S%H5352>clearing<s%> the guilty, <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation.

<S%H5545>Pardon,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and as you have <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2008>now.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H5545>pardoned<s%> according to your <S%H1697>word:<s%>
But as <S%H199>truly<s%> as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H582>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> which have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and my <S%H226>miracles,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and have <S%H5254>tempted<s%> me <S%H2088>now<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> times, and have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

<S%H518>Surely<s%> they shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> of them that <S%H5006>provoked<s%> me <S%H7200>see<s%> it:

But my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with him, and has <S%H310>followed<s%> me <S%H4392>fully,<s%> him will I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H824>where<s%> <S%H8432><s%> he <S%H935>went;<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

(Now the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>) <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> you, and <S%H5265>get<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall I bear with <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me? I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

<S%H559>Say<s%> to them, As truly as I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you:

Your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of you, according to your <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%><S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.

<S%H518>Doubtless<s%> you shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> concerning <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>swore<s%> to make you <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein, <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>

But your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, which you <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey,<s%> them will I <S%H935>bring<s%> in, and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3988>despised.<s%>
But as for you, your <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall <S%H7462>wander<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2184>prostitutions,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> be <S%H8552>wasted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

After the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H8446>searched<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> each <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H8141>year,<s%> shall you <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> even <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H8569>breach<s%> of <S%H748>promise.<s%>

I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>said,<s%> I will <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that are <S%H3259>gathered<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> me: in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> they shall be <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And the <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and made <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, by <S%H3318>bringing<s%> up a <S%H1681>slander<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%>

Even <S%H582>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that did <S%H3318>bring<s%> up the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H4046>plague<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh,<s%> which were of the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> still.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>sayings<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And they <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5927>got<s%> them up <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> we be here, and will <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H559>promised:<s%> for we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H2088>now<s%> do you <S%H5674>transgress<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> but it shall not <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
<S%H5927>Go<s%> not up, for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is not <S%H7130>among<s%> you; that you be not <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

For the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> are <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H310>away<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will not be with you.

But they <S%H6075>presumed<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H7218>top:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4185>departed<s%> not out of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Then the <S%H6003>Amalekites<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in that <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H3807>discomfited<s%> them, even to <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>
